sentences.english: China is an important producer of the Yali pear (Pyrus bertschneideri Reld).
sentences.chinese: 鴨梨屬於白梨品系，中國是鴨梨的主要產地。

sentences.english: China is an important producer of the Yali pear (Pyrus bertschneideri Reld).
sentences.chinese: 鴨梨屬於白梨品系，中國是鴨梨的主要產地。

sentences.english: They all know of, Xuan, that being like alike object of duck pear is a Xuan.
sentences.chinese: 他們都懂的，壎，那個像鴨梨一樣的東西是壎。

sentences.english: Outside in a car take back took on the rabbit sister-in-law took the hand of pears.
sentences.chinese: 在外拍歸來途中的汽車內，拍的兔嫂拿鴨梨的手。

sentences.english: The variation law of storage nourishment of off-lying developmental branch and short branch were the same.
sentences.chinese: 不同樹勢鴨梨貯藏營養的變化都呈現相同的規律。

sentences.english: Cangzhou is the famous "Pear Village" and "Watkins jujube" village.
sentences.chinese: 滄州是著名的“鴨梨之鄉”和“金絲小棗”之鄉。

sentences.english: Today, the county of 15 million mu of pear acreage, annual production of 200 million kilograms.
sentences.chinese: 現今，全縣鴨梨種植面積15萬畝，年產量2億公斤。

sentences.english: "Ya Pear" is a mainstay industry in Yangxin county and it is also the main source of farmers' income.
sentences.chinese: 鴨梨是陽信縣農業的支柱產業，農民收入的主要來源。

sentences.english: Ever think we might be a bit embarrassed to have you as an American?
sentences.chinese: 有沒有想過你是美國人也給別人帶來了鴨梨？

sentences.english: The results showed that Dayali pear is an excellent germplasm resource for pear polyploid breeding.
sentences.chinese: 結果表明，大鴨梨爲倍性育種的優異種質資源。

sentences.english: Look at the pear , like a doll in the tree, so cute.
sentences.chinese: 看那黃澄澄的鴨梨，像一個娃娃在樹上，那麼可愛。

sentences.english: My hometown is beautiful Cangzhou. It teems of date and ya pear.
sentences.chinese: 我的家鄉是美麗的滄州，生產金絲小棗和泊頭大鴨梨。

to join in the fun/to get in on the action/(fig.) to butt in/to create more trouble
